How do pooled AI actions work?

text: Can I buy more AI actions?
Yes! Core and Team users can purchase AI Actions Packs for ¬£20. Each pack includes 1
file: 000 AI actions that expire after 90 days. You can stack up to 5 packs at once. Starter users can add the AI Booster (¬£5/month) for an extra 200 actions per month.

text: What happens when I reach my monthly limit?
When you reach your AI action limit
file: the system will block new AI operations until your monthly allowance resets. You can still manually edit stories
lineEnd: and use all non-AI features. Core users with rollover will also have their banked actions available. Consider purchasing an AI Actions Pack or upgrading your plan to continue using AI features.

text: Can free users get more AI time without upgrading?
